attributes.action: We want a general election to choose the party who will lead Brexit negotiations
attributes.additional_details: A majority voted to leave the European Union in 2016. Three years later the voting public have to watch as each political party moves for position of power, as opposed to honouring the public vote and decision.
attributes.background:
For three years the UK government and the Houses of Parliament have debated exiting the EU.

In the past few weeks we have seen endless debate, delay, and indecision.  

The people of the United Kingdom request a general election to chose the party to lead Brexit negotiations and exit.
